DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish BMS-986165 safe effective treat autoimmune disease . BMS-986165 show promise preclinical study inhibit autoimmune condition . This study first time drug give human , conduct entirely healthy subject . It run 4 Parts . Part A investigate single oral dos drug . Part B investigate give drug daily 14 day . Part C investigate daily dose 14 day healthy volunteer Japanese decent . Part D investigate whether food , stomach acidity give drug capsule make difference safety potential use drug .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study BMS-986165 Healthy Subjects Treat Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Healthy Male Female participant 18 50 year age ( Parts AD ) Participants recent infection Participants low blood pressure increase heart rate Participants chronic health relate problem Participants active cancer within last 5 year Participants major medical illness
